title: Indie Fonts 3
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Books](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Books) : Indie Fonts 3**

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IndieFonts3_3794.jpg)

_Indie Fonts 3_, a companion to the award winning [Indie Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Indie%20Fonts) series, brings together an additional 20 independent font foundries from around the world. This book is an invaluable resource of over 1,900 fonts for designers, art directors and typographers.

This book is divided up by foundry so that the user can get a feel for the work produced by each group. This also makes it convenient to order fonts directly from their source. There is a visual font index provided in the front for quick scanning and a fully cross referenced index in the back containing font names, designers, and original designers. Also included are the essays: _Eight Is Not Enough_ by noted typophile [Yves Peters](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Yves%20Peters) and _How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the EULA_ by typographic designer and educator [Tiffany Wardle](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Tiffany%20Wardle).

Contributing foundries include [Baseline Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Baseline%20Fonts), [Blue Vinyl Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Blue%20Vinyl%20Fonts), [Device Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Device%20Fonts), [E-phemera Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/E-phemera%20Fonts), [Font Brothers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Brothers), [Handselecta](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Handselecta), [Jeremy Tankard Typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Jeremy%20Tankard%20Typography), [Kenn Munk](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Kenn%20Munk), [Letterhead Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Letterhead%20Fonts), [Pizzadude](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Pizzadude), [Positype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Positype), [Process Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Process%20Type%20Foundry), [Rimmer Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Rimmer%20Type%20Foundry), [Shinntype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Shinntype), [SparkyType](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/SparkyType), [Suitcase Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Suitcase%20Type%20Foundry), [Suomi Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Suomi%20Type%20Foundry), [Village](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Village), [Virus Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Virus%20Fonts), and [Wilton Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Wilton%20Foundry).

Accompanying this book is a Bonus Fonts CD-ROM that contains 53 indie fonts. The fonts are licensed from each contributing foundry for use solely by the owner of this book.

Websites: [P-Type Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.indie-fonts.com/) | [Typeco](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619154303/http:/www.typeco.com/3Books2.html)

author: James Grieshaber
